description: A prison guard was attacked by an inmate with a shiv, leaving the guard with multiple stab wounds and other serious injuries.
An inmate used a sharpened toothbrush to stab another prisoner multiple times during a fight in the yard.
A group of inmates attacked a fellow prisoner with a sock filled with bars of soap, causing serious head injuries.
A corrections officer was hit over the head with a metal tray by an inmate, causing a skull fracture and other injuries.
An inmate used a homemade weapon to attack another prisoner, causing life-threatening injuries.
A prison fight broke out between rival gang members, resulting in one inmate being stabbed multiple times with a sharpened piece of metal.
A prisoner attacked a guard with a metal chair, causing the guard to suffer a concussion and other injuries.
A group of inmates attacked a rival gang member with a broken broomstick, causing multiple lacerations and other injuries.
An inmate attacked another prisoner with a sharpened piece of plastic, causing deep wounds and other injuries.
